message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $120.
I understand you're looking for a deal, Bob, but $120 is a bit below my minimum. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $180, so I'll offer it to you for $150.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $135?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit further, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'll offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $145?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'll make one more compromise. I'll sell it to you for $165, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $155?
I've already made some significant concessions, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $170. That's my final offer.
I understand you've made some significant concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $170. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $170, which is $145. That's my final offer.
